author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and designed a sound design for this 1920s footage, which captures rare glimpses of California, Home movie. The video takes you through bustling streets, sunlit neighborhoods, and serene coastal scenes, revealing everyday life in a way you’ve never seen before, while highlighting the charm and energy of early 20th-century California.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: Library and Archives Canada. Ross J. Therrien, 1975-0233. IDC: 350680

title: California 1920s in color, Home movie [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
